scripts.sonar:scan: npm run sonar:scan:backend && npm run sonar:scan:frontend
scripts.sonar:quick:backend: cd backend && .\mvnw.cmd clean spotless:check checkstyle:check install sonar:sonar
scripts.sonar:quick:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:report && npm run test:unit && npm run sonar
scripts.sonar:quick: npm run sonar:quick:backend && npm run sonar:quick:frontend
scripts.sonar:full:backend: cd backend && .\mvnw.cmd clean spotless:check checkstyle:check install && .\mvnw.cmd org.pitest:pitest-maven:mutationCoverage && node ../.github/scripts/convert-pitest-to-sonar.js && .\mvnw.cmd sonar:sonar -Pmutation
scripts.sonar:full:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:report && npm run test:unit && npm run stryker && npm run sonar
scripts.sonar:full: npm run sonar:full:backend && npm run sonar:full:frontend
scripts.sonar:e2e: npm run e2e:coverage && npm run sonar:scan:e2e:backend && npm run sonar:scan:e2e:frontend
scripts.sonar:scan:e2e:backend: cd backend && .\mvnw.cmd sonar:sonar -Dsonar.projectKey=RPG-manager-backend-services-e2e -Dsonar.projectName="RPG Manager - Backend (E2E Coverage)" -Dsonar.coverage.jacoco.xmlReportPaths="**/target/site/jacoco-e2e/jacoco.xml" -Dsonar.tests= -Dsonar.test.inclusions= -Dsonar.test.exclusions=**/*
scripts.sonar:scan:e2e:frontend: cd frontend && npx sonar-scanner -Dsonar.projectKey=RPG-manager-frontend-e2e -Dsonar.projectName="RPG Manager - Frontend (E2E Coverage)" -Dsonar.javascript.lcov.reportPaths=test-results/coverage/lcov.info -Dsonar.typescript.lcov.reportPaths=test-results/coverage/lcov.info -Dsonar.sources=src/app -Dsonar.tests=e2e -Dsonar.test.inclusions="e2e/**/*.spec.ts" -Dsonar.exclusions="**/node_modules/**,**/mock/**,**/*.spec.ts" -Dsonar.externalIssuesReportPaths=

frontend/src/**/*.{ts,html}: cmd /c "cd frontend && npm run lint & rem"
cmd /c "cd frontend && npm run test:unit & rem"
